description: The data type of a signal's values, determining how it can be targeted
title: Signal Value Type

x-enum-descriptions.binary: Boolean signal - user either matches or doesn't (e.g., 'likely_tesla_buyers')
x-enum-descriptions.categorical: Signal with discrete values from a defined set (e.g., 'vehicle_ownership' with values 'tesla', 'bmw', etc.)
x-enum-descriptions.numeric: Signal with continuous numeric values within a range (e.g., 'purchase_propensity' from 0.0 to 1.0)
